title:
Are These Steep Driveway Photos Real? 
The pictures were often referred to as being "older than the internet."
text: Pictures show an SUV climbing a steep driveway in a new neighborhood.
sources: ['“5028 W New Bridge Rd, Fayetteville, AR 72704.” Zillow, https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/5028-W-New-Bridge-Rd-Fayetteville-AR-72704/134638285_zpid/.', '  Did This New Home (Disaster) Ever Sell? city-data.com, 23 Jan. 2016, http://www.city-data.com/forum/real-estate/2518621-did-new-home-disaster-ever-sell.html.', '  “Don’t Build Your Driveway like This.” The Garage Journal, 21 Nov. 2011, https://www.garagejournal.com/forum/threads/dont-build-your-driveway-like-this.126162/.', '  “Google Maps.” Google Maps, https://www.google.com/maps.', '  Maximum Residential Driveway Slope? 19 July 2006, https://www.cyburbia.org/forums/threads/maximum-residential-driveway-slope.25606/.']

title:
Has Switzerland Approved 3D-Printed Pods for Assisted Suicide? 
The Sarco capsules will reportedly be ready for use in 2022.
text: 3D-printed Sarco capsules for assisted suicides, which can be activated from the inside by the person intending to die, have been approved under Swiss law.
sources: ['Andorno, Roberto. “Nonphysician-Assisted Suicide in Switzerland.” Cambridge Quarterly of Healthcare Ethics, vol. 22, no. 3, 2013, pp. 246–253., doi:10.1017/S0963180113000054. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', '“Did Hawaii Buy ‘Death Pods’ After Legalizing Physician-Assisted Death?” Snopes.Com, 5 Dec. 2020. https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/hawaii-death-pods/. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', '“3D-Printed Suicide Pods Become Legal in Switzerland to Offer Peaceful Death.” 3D-Printed Suicide Pods Become Legal in Switzerland to Offer Peaceful Death, https://www.trtworld.com/magazine/3d-printed-suicide-pods-become-legal-in-switzerland-to-offer-peaceful-death-52481. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', 'Hehli, Simon, and Ruth Fulterer. “Aktivisten Sehen Keine Juristischen Hindernisse Für Einen Einsatz Der Suizidkapsel in Der Schweiz – Doch Es Gibt Grosse Zweifel Am «Tesla Der Sterbehilfe».” Neue Zurcher Zeitung, 8 Dec. 2021, https://www.nzz.ch/technologie/aktivisten-sehen-keine-juristischen-hindernisse-fuer-einsatz-der-suizidkapsel-in-der-schweiz-doch-es-gibt-grosse-zweifel-ld.1659112. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', 'Hurst, Samia A., and Alex Mauron . “Assisted Suicide in Switzerland: Clarifying Liberties and Claims.” Bioethics, Oct. 2016, https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/bioe.12304. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', 'Keith, Morgan. “3D-Printed Suicide Pods Are Now Legal in Switzerland.” Business Insider, https://www.businessinsider.com/sarco-machines-3d-printed-capsule-assisted-suicide-pod-booth-switzerland-2021-12. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', '“Maker of Suicide Pod Plans to Launch in Switzerland.” BBC News, 9 Dec. 2021. www.bbc.com, https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-59577162. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', 'Manser, Corsin. “Die Halbe Welt Spricht Über Die «Schweizer» Suizidkapsel – Doch Es Gibt 2 Haken.” Watson, 8 Dec. 2021, https://www.watson.ch/schweiz/best%20of%20watson/922740358-die-suizidkapsel-macht-schlagzeilen-dabei-ist-sie-gar-nicht-zugelassen. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', 'Nadeau, Barbie Latza. “Switzerland Approves Assisted ‘Suicide Capsule.’” The Daily Beast, 6 Dec. 2021. www.thedailybeast.com, https://www.thedailybeast.com/switzerland-approves-assisted-suicide-capsule. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', '“No, Switzerland Has Not Approved a ‘Suicide Capsule.’” AP NEWS, 9 Dec. 2021, https://apnews.com/article/fact-checking-993202650845. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.', '“Sarco Suicide Capsule Hopes to Enter Switzerland.” SWI Swissinfo.Ch, https://www.swissinfo.ch/eng/sci-tech/sarco-suicide-capsule–passes-legal-review–in-switzerland/46966510. Accessed 13 Dec. 2021.']

title:
Did Boris Johnson Cover CCTV Cameras With Plastic Bags?

title:
Beware of Homeowners 'Savings' and 'Stimulus' Scams 
It might not be a good sign when the bottom of a brand new website displays a list of "disclaimers" in small print addressed to "Facebook reviewers and 3rd party fact checkers."
text: A "savings" or "stimulus" worth $3,600, $3,700, $3,712, $3,800, or another similar amount is available for homeowners in the U.S.

title:
UPDATED: Is It True That No One Has Died of Omicron Variant? 
Early studies indicate the strain may cause less severe COVID-19 symptoms compared to its precursor, the delta variant.
text: As of early December 2021, no one worldwide who tested positive for the omicron variant of the coronavirus had died.
sources: ['CDC. ‘Omicron Variant: What You Need to Know’. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, 8 Dec. 2021, https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/variants/omicron-variant.html.', 'The Omicron Variant: What You Need to Know. https://www.muhealth.org/our-stories/omicron-variant-what-you-need-know. title:
Did Karl Rove Say 'We're an Empire Now'? 
Many have assumed it was Rove who made the comment during the George W. Bush administration.
text: Karl Rove, adviser to U.S. President George W. Bush, made an iconic comment that included the phrase, "We're an empire now."
sources: ['Andersen, Kurt. “How the U.S. Lost Its Mind.” The Atlantic, 8 Aug. 2017, https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2017/09/how-america-lost-its-mind/534231/.', 'Suskind, Ron. “Faith, Certainty and the Presidency of George W. Bush.” The New York Times, 17 Oct. 2004. NYTimes.com, https://www.nytimes.com/2004/10/17/magazine/faith-certainty-and-the-presidency-of-george-w-bush.html.', 'Schonfeld, Zach. “We Made Karl Rove Listen to The National, and He Wasn’t Impressed.” Newsweek, 8 Sept. 2017, https://www.newsweek.com/national-sleep-well-beast-karl-rove-662307.']

title:
Did Biden Read 'End of Message' During Bob Dole Tribute? 
Right-leaning critics of the president seized upon what appeared to be an unfortunate mistake during a speech in December 2021.
text: In a speech paying tribute to Bob Dole, in December 2021, President Joe Biden read aloud "End of message."
sources: ['“Opinion | Bob Dole: America Needs Unity to Rediscover Its Greatness.” Washington Post. www.washingtonpost.com, https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2021/12/06/bob-dole-op-ed-what-america-needs/. title:
Did George the Dog Give His Life to Save 5 Kids from 2 Pit Bulls? 
'Tis the story of a "tiny" dog's bravery years ago in Manaia, New Zealand.
text: A small dog named George gave his life to save five children from two pit bulls.
sources: ['“Bravery Medals for Terrier Who Died Saving Kids from Pit Bulls.” The Star-Democrat and Associated Press, 18 May 2007, https://www.newspapers.com/image/116117833/?terms=george%20jack%20russell%20zealand&match=1.', '  Hulbert, Richard Woodd and Jayne. “George the Jack Russell Dies Saving Kids.” The Sydney Morning Herald, 2 May 2007, https://www.smh.com.au/world/george-the-jack-russell-dies-saving-kids-20070503-gdq1p3.html.', '  Pawedy. “George the Jack Russell Who Died Saving Kids.” Pawedy, 15 Oct. 2018, https://medium.com/pawedy/george-the-jack-russell-who-died-saving-kids-b1b950090bf1.', '  “Terrier Comes to Aid of Kids in N. title:
Did Jamie Oliver Prove McDonald's Burgers Are Unfit for Human Consumption? 
An outdated controversy about McDonald's use of beef treated with ammonium hydroxide resurfaced on social media.
text: Celebrity chef Jamie Oliver proved that the meat in McDonald's hamburgers is "unfit for human consumption" due to the use of beef trimmings treated with bacteria-killing ammonium hydroxide.
